item.title: Resolved problem that ESlint HTML report is not displayed correctly in Jenkins job
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to resolve the issue of ESlint HTML report not displaying correctly in Jenkins jobs due to Content Security Policy restrictions, including the steps to configure Jenkins to allow the report to load properly.
